content:
186 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (xi) BIU requires the three (3) 'O' level subjects to 
come from either Arts or Social Sciences.  
(xii) EDWIN CLARK also requires ‘O’ level credit pass 
in Government.  
(xiii) FED-DUTSE accepts five (5)‘O’ level credit passes 
to include English Language, Mathematics, and 
two (2)Arts subjects and one (1)Social Sciences. 
Literature in English is an added advantage.  
(xiv) FED-DUTSE and REDEEMER'S accept ‘O’ level pass 
in Mathematics.  
(xv) FED-DUTSINMA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credits 
passes to include Literature in English and 
Mathematics.  
(xvi) FED-LAFIA and LAGOS require five (5) ‘O’ level 
credit passes to include Literature in English, 
English Language, Mathematics and one (1) other 
Arts subjects.  
(xvii) IBADAN requires five (5) or six (6) 'O' level credit 
passes at one (1) or two (2) sittings to include 
Literature in English, English Language, one (1) 
other Arts subject and any other two (2) or three 
(3) subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science. 
(xviii) ILORIN accepts any Arts / Social Science 
subjects  
(xix) KWASU accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in  
English Language, Literature in English plus two 
(2) Arts subjects and one (1) Social  
Science/Science subject.  
(xx) LAGOS requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Literature in 
English and any two (2) of French, 
History/Government, CRS/IS and any Nigerian 
Language.  
(xxi) NTNU accepts any Arts/Social Science subjects.
